name: mini-dashboard-suporte
description: Mini Dashboard de Suporte - Sistema de tickets com backend NestJS, admin Angular e cliente React

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.install:all:force: npm install && cd backend && npm install --force && cd ../admin && npm install --force && cd ../client && npm install --force
scripts.dev:client: cd client && NODE_OPTIONS="--openssl-legacy-provider" PORT=3001 npm start
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
